comments.body:
I wonder why it was reversed in the first place.

When sorting by `_doc` will the order of results always be nondeterministic given the same search parameters?

yes

> I wonder why it was reversed in the first place.

Any idea who could answer that question ?

          val hits = jsObj.fields("hits").asJsObject.fields("hits").asInstanceOf[JsArray]
          val messages = hits.elements.map { element =>
            val doc = element.asJsObject
            val id = doc.fields("_id").asInstanceOf[JsString].value

comments.body: Not sure what we have said in Alpakka in general, but default parameter is in general a real headache when it comes to maintaining binary compatibility, so that could be the reason we didn't have it here.
For the future I mean, right now we don't guarantee bincomp here.
Ok, I'll try to keep that in mind.
